001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.service;
002
003import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
004import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
005import androidx.room.Database;
006import androidx.room.RoomDatabase;
007import androidx.room.TypeConverter;
008import androidx.room.TypeConverters;
009import androidx.sqlite.db.SupportSQLiteDatabase;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.dao.ScoreDao;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.dao.UserDao;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.Score;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.entity.User;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.pojo.UserScore;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.service.GravityDatabase.Converters;
016import java.time.Instant;
017
018
019@Database(
020    entities = {User.class, Score.class},
021    views = {UserScore.class},
022    version = 1
023)
024
025@TypeConverters(Converters.class)
026
027public abstract class GravityDatabase extends RoomDatabase {
028
029  public static final String NAME = "gravity_scores";
030
031
032  public abstract UserDao getUserDao();
033
034  public abstract ScoreDao getScoreDao();
035
036  public static class Converters {
037
038    @TypeConverter
039    @Nullable
040    public static Long toLong(@Nullable Instant value) {
041      return (value != null) ? value.toEpochMilli() : null;
042    }
043
044    @TypeConverter
045    @Nullable
046    public static Instant toInstant(@Nullable Long value) {
047      return (value != null) ? Instant.ofEpochMilli(value) : null;
048    }
049  }
050
051  public static class Callback extends RoomDatabase.Callback {
052
053    @Override
054    public void onCreate(@NonNull SupportSQLiteDatabase db) {
055      super.onCreate(db);
056    }
057  }
058}
